715169f-a.title: Manhattan: 118th Street (East) - Pleasant Avenue
715169f-a.text:
502-504 East 118th Street, south side, just east of
Pleasant avenue. No. 502 is a 24-story frame house.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 250
CREDIT LINE IDERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.

715168f-a.title: Manhattan: 118th Street (East) - Pleasant Avenue
715168f-a.text:
(1)
East 118th Street, north side, east from (No. 517), but not in-
oluding Pleasant Ave., to the Harlem River. Notice building on Eandkhl's
Island in the background.
September 12, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, and showing a oloser view of Nos. 517 to 529.
July 16, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
